Abstract of final year thesis titled " HYDRODYNAMIC STUDY OF THE FLOW DUE TO DAM BREAK AROUND RECTANGULAR OBSTACLE" :- During a dam break, the entire valley is affected, according to which bridges, houses, and roads become flow obstacles. The case was simulated by the LSM based CFD program i.e. REEF3D, which solves in compressible RANS equation with k-œâ turbulence model and shows free surface in a realistic manner.
